metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000035 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Tiny Tiny RSS before 829d478f is vulnerable to XSS window.opener attack

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tt-rss - 17.1+git20170410+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tt-rss package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '17.1+git20170410+dfsg-2').
